name: wolf-ecs
description: An entity component system framework for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.pub: npm run build && (cd dist; npm publish && (cd ../; npm run gh-release))
scripts.gh-release: gh release create $(git describe --tags --abbrev=0) dist/*.js dist/*.d.ts -n ""
scripts.build: rm -rf build; tsc; npm run test && (rm -rf dist; rollup -c; cp package.json README.md dist)
scripts.build-nocheck: rm -rf build; tsc; npm run test-nocheck; rm -rf dist; rollup -c; cp package.json README.md dist

author: EnderShadow8
